main event: A red flickering light the size of the North Star was observed near the star Altair in the Milky Way.
interesting points: The light disappeared twice for about 2 seconds.
The object had no sound and no radar signature.
The object traveled from northwest to southeast and faded into the Milky Way.
The observer was on duty at a radar site located at DKGF5232.
The object was observed for 54 seconds.
